function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global spread of COVID-19","Impact":"Severe impacts on public health, economy, and society","Mitigation":"Implementing strict social distancing measures, border control, and travel restrictions","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, temperature screening, and quarantine monitoring technology","People":"General public, healthcare workers, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Governments, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Disruption of global supply chains and production","Impact":"Economic downturn, shortages of essential goods, and increased unemployment","Mitigation":"Diversifying supply chains, increasing local production, and stockpiling critical resources","Technologies":"Supply chain management software, predictive analytics for demand planning, and blockchain for transparency","People":"Businesses, workers, consumers","Owner":"Businesses, governments"},{"Description":"Unpredictable implications of social distancing measures","Impact":"Uncertain socio-economic and mental health effects","Mitigation":"Investing in mental health support, monitoring socio-economic indicators, and providing financial assistance","Technologies":"Telemedicine, remote therapy platforms, and data analytics for economic monitoring","People":"General public, vulnerable populations, mental health professionals","Owner":"Government, healthcare providers"}]}
